theses.title: Delegation is Power Transfer
theses.text: Delegation to agents is not automation; it is the surrender of deterministic policy to stochastic systems.

theses.title: Efficiency â‰  Sovereignty
theses.text: Performance and control are now divergent variables.

theses.title: Virtue is Survival
theses.text: Ethics is an insurance policy against agentic reputational collapse, not a growth lever.

theses.title: Updates are Economic Events
theses.text: Model updates are third-party market interventions, not maintenance.

theses.title: Exit is a Technical Mirage
theses.text: You can export data, but not reasoning. Distillation is the only partial exit.

theses.title: Survivability > Exit
theses.text: The metric is "What runs when cognition degrades?" not "Can we leave?"

theses.title: Update Authority is the Chokepoint
theses.text: Who controls the weights controls the business.

theses.title: Hybrid is Structural
theses.text: Edge = Execution/Privacy. Cloud = Reasoning/Scale. This is permanent.

theses.title: Procurement is Enforcement
theses.text: Only buying power forces architectural sovereignty.

theses.title: Habits Persist by UX
theses.text: Sovereignty fails if the UX is inferior to the locked-in alternative.

theses.title: The Agentic Divide
theses.text: Sovereignty is distributed by technical literacy and infrastructure access.

theses.title: Democratic Sovereignty is Non-Default
theses.text: It must be engineered; the state prioritizes industrial survival.

theses.title: Retail = Governor of Cognition
theses.text: Retailers are now certifiers of agentic outcomes, not just merchants.

theses.title: Context is Shelf Space
theses.text: Visibility depends on retrieval context, not physical placement.
